description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the supply of medium coarse kiln-dried wood shavings (softwood) on an as and when requested basis for the destinations Pakenham Breeding Farm and Ottawa Stable. The intend is to establish a one year contract with three (3) optional one-year periods. Up to two contracts may be awarded in result of this solicitation.,
